awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 1 win & 6 nominations.

fullplot: The Cotton Club was a famous night club in Harlem. The story follows the people that visited the club, those that ran it, and is peppered with the Jazz music that made it so famous.

title: The Cotton Club
